titleStmt.title: A progresse of pietie. Or the harbour of heauenly harts ease to recreate the afflicted soules of all such as are shut vp in anye inward or outward affliction. By Iohn Norden.
titleStmt.author: Norden, John, 1548-1625?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. Windet for I. Oxenbridge, and are to be soulde in Paules Church-yarde at the signe of the Parrot,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: Paules Church-yarde at the signe of the Parrot
